name: libcmd - Least Ambiguous Command Parser
short_description: A least ambiguous command parser in C library form.  Test programs included demonstrate command line and interactive parsing.  Written before 1985, used in many of the author's projects.  Updated for 1986 ISO C, and compiles under common C.
